ValidationRule.description: Een eenvoudige controle op bestaanbaarheid van telefoonnummers in Nederland. Daarbij een foutmelding tonen als het nummer niet door de validatie komt. https://ict-woonstadrotterdam.atlassian.net/wiki/x/BQAuLQ
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED(Mobile_Business_Phone__c), NOT( OR( ISBLANK(Mobile_Business_Phone__c),
AND( BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "+"), NOT(BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "+0")), REGEX(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "^\\+?[1-9]{1}[0-9]*$") ),
AND( OR( BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "080"), BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "0900"), BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "0906"), BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "0909") ), OR( LEN(Mobile_Business_Phone__c) = 8, LEN(Mobile_Business_Phone__c) = 11 ), NOT(LEN(Mobile_Business_Phone__c) = 10) ),
AND( BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "044"), LEN(Mobile_Business_Phone__c) >= 6, LEN(Mobile_Business_Phone__c) <= 14 ),
AND( BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "0"), NOT( OR( BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "080"), BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "0900"), BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "0906"), BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "0909"), BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "044") ) ), LEN(Mobile_Business_Phone__c) = 10 ),
AND( BEGINS(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "1"), OR( LEN(Mobile_Business_Phone__c) = 3, LEN(Mobile_Business_Phone__c) = 4, LEN(Mobile_Business_Phone__c) = 5, LEN(Mobile_Business_Phone__c) = 6 ) ),
REGEX(Mobile_Business_Phone__c, "^[2-9]{1}[0-9]{2}[\\s.-]?[0-9]{3}[\\s.-]?[0-9]{4}$") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Validate if the phone number is entered correctly. Spaces, slashes and brackets are not allowed.
